<< restoredefaultpath functions manager userpath >>

rmpath

Remove directory from search path.

Syntax

rmpath(dirname)
previouspaths = rmpath(dirname)

Input argument

dirname

name of directory to remove

Output argument

previouspaths

a string: path prior to removing the specified paths

Description

rmpath removes directory from search path.

Example

path
addpath(tempdir())
path			
rmpath(tempdir())
path

See also

path, addpath.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
